title: DirectX Unknown Error
body: I just factory reset an old computer, got everything up to date, and I ran the DirectX Diagnostic tool and it says I have version 11. Yet when I start League of Legends, it says I have an unknown version and can not run. I get to the champion select but after that it crashes. Please can someone help?

replies.body: There could be a few issues for this like how a piece of software is interacting with your graphics card.  As a first step, go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide which will provide a few steps to troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any issues from there, and we can dig a bit deeper.

I actually managed to fix it ironically, from updating to windows 7 to windows 10 , don't know what the difference was but at least I don't have to go into the game crash guide to figure it out. But thank you very much.
